musicalLanguage.description: A peaceful, rolling piece that mimics the rhythm of ocean waves. The left hand provides a steady rocking arpeggio pattern while the right hand plays a simple, singing melody. The effect is hypnotic and calming.
teachingGoals: Develop a smooth, rocking accompaniment pattern
Learn to shape a melody over a repeating ostinato
styleTips: The left hand is the waves â€” keep it perfectly even and hypnotic
The melody should float above like a seabird
